metadataAttributes.Title: Finance of Mergers and Acquisitions: Valuation and Pricing
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course teaches how to value and price M&A deals and to choose the optimal financing mix for an M&A deal. The course focuses on all the major types of M&A deals including strategic M&A, private equity leveraged buyouts (LBOs), and restructuring deals such as spinoffs and asset transfers.
